name: api_utility_ParticleSystem
description: Script interface for the Built-in Particle System. Unity's powerful and versatile particle system implementation.

properties.name: collision
properties.description: Script interface for the CollisionModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: colorBySpeed
properties.description: Script interface for the ColorByLifetimeModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: colorOverLifetime
properties.description: Script interface for the ColorOverLifetimeModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: customData
properties.description: Script interface for the CustomDataModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: emission
properties.description: Script interface for the EmissionModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: externalForces
properties.description: Script interface for the ExternalForcesModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: forceOverLifetime
properties.description: Script interface for the ForceOverLifetimeModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: has3DParticleRotations
properties.description: Determines whether the Particle System rotates its particles around only the Z axis, or whether the system specifies separate values for the X, Y and Z axes.

properties.name: hasNonUniformParticleSizes
properties.description: Determines whether the Particle System uses a single value for the width and height (and depth, when using meshes), or if the system specifies different values for each axis.

properties.name: inheritVelocity
properties.description: Script interface for the InheritVelocityModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: isEmitting
properties.description: Determines whether the Particle System is emitting particles. A Particle System may stop emitting when its emission module has finished, it has been paused or if the system has been stopped using Stop with the StopEmitting flag. Resume emitting by calling Play.

properties.name: isPaused
properties.description: Determines whether the Particle System is paused.

properties.name: isPlaying
properties.description: Determines whether the Particle System is playing.

properties.name: isStopped
properties.description: Determines whether the Particle System is in the stopped state.

properties.name: lifetimeByEmitterSpeed
properties.description: Script interface for the Particle System Lifetime By Emitter Speed module.

properties.name: lights
properties.description: Script interface for the LightsModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: limitVelocityOverLifetime
properties.description: Script interface for the LimitVelocityOverLifetimeModule of a Particle System. .

properties.name: main
properties.description: Access the main Particle System settings.

properties.name: noise
properties.description: Script interface for the NoiseModule of a Particle System.

properties.name: particleCount
properties.description: The current number of particles (Read Only). The number doesn't include particles of child Particle Systems
